content:
This is based on SMART App Launch v1.0.0:

If app requests scopes patient/Patient.read, patient/Condition.readat SMART App Launch step 7.1.1, could server grant patient/*.* at step 7.1.3?

From the note in step 7.1.3

scope | required | Scope of access authorized. Note that this can be different from the scopes requested by the app.

the above response is valid. Is my understanding correct?
Yes. This is scope negotiation. A client can request any set of scopes, and the server (together with the user) can grant any set of scopes (overlapping, superset, subset, whatever).
Yunwei Wang has marked this topic as resolved.
